MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L34 postcode area of Prescot, affecting properties in Knowsley Park Lane, Egerton Road, Elm House and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:54PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on our electrical cable network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 01:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:51PM on 4th April 2021.
